mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_dups_miss(arr):
    mi = min(arr)
    ma = max(arr)
    c = Counter(arr)
    duplicates = sorted((n for n in c if c[n] > 1))
    expected_sum = ma * (ma + 1) // 2 + mi * (mi - 1) // 2
    actual_sum = sum(c)
    missing_number = expected_sum - actual_sum
    return [missing_number, duplicates]
